text:
Rhumbix | Full Stack Developers | San Fransisco or Remote

Rhumbix is dedicated to building a better construction craft workforce by enabling them with modern technology. We are looking for an entrepreneurial engineer who is up for the challenge of building our awesome products and improving our engineering practices. At its core, our system aggregates data from mobile devices on construction sites to provide real-time data and analytics.

We are hiring for full-stack and front-end focused devs looking to branch out, https://rhumbix.com/about-rhumbix/careers/
